column3: Latest;Taken from Mech Dara on Twitter.------Wild cattle spotted in the forest ------pic.twitter.com/g5FrPI9R7D------Please help protect the remaining wildlife …hope i can see him/her with my own eyes once day ------pic.twitter.com/Fh8lnJCWvv------Our wildlife is facing with extinction because of deforestation… ------pic.twitter.com/4v0hp58j83------Please protect us because we also want to live like u… ------pic.twitter.com/B0VRmJx0ya------Please Mr stop killing us Mr poachers… ------pic.twitter.com/Sc4v90oWMa
